tool_description: The Zip Code API provides the following functions: Distance Between Zip Code API - The API allows you to quickly and easily figure out the distance between zip codes.Zip Codes in Radius API - You can use this API to find all zip codes within a given radius from another zip code.Zip Code to City and State API and Zip Code to Latitude/Longitude API - The API can convert a zip code to the primary location for the zip code. This includes the city, state, latitude, and longitude for the primary lo...
name: RedLine Zipcode
title: RedLine Zipcode

api_list.name: Multiple Zip Codes to Location Information
api_list.description: Returns location information for multiple zip codes (up to 100).  This information includes city, state, latitude, longitude, and time zone information.  It also contains a list of other acceptable city names for the locations.  **Each zip code provided will count as a separate request.** For example, if you send 5 zip codes, you will be charged for 5 requests.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://redline-redline-zipcode.p.rapidapi.com/rest/multi-info.json/08057,08055/degrees"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "redline-redline-zipcode.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://redline-redline-zipcode.p.rapidapi.com/rest/multi-info.json/{zipcodes}/{units}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "redline-redline-zipcode.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: State to Zip Codes
api_list.description: Get all zip codes for a state.  **Each 10 zip codes returned are charged as separate request.** For example, if the state you select returns 200 zip codes, you will be charged for 20 requests.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://redline-redline-zipcode.p.rapidapi.com/rest/state-zips.json/RI"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "redline-redline-zipcode.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://redline-redline-zipcode.p.rapidapi.com/rest/state-zips.json/{state}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "redline-redline-zipcode.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Zip Codes within Radius
api_list.description: Returns all zip codes within a radius of the given zip code.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://redline-redline-zipcode.p.rapidapi.com/rest/radius.json/08057/10/mile"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "redline-redline-zipcode.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://redline-redline-zipcode.p.rapidapi.com/rest/radius.json/{zipcode}/{radius}/{units}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "redline-redline-zipcode.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Distance Between Zip Codes
api_list.description: Determine the distance between two zip codes.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://redline-redline-zipcode.p.rapidapi.com/rest/distance.json/08057/94035/mile"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "redline-redline-zipcode.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://redline-redline-zipcode.p.rapidapi.com/rest/distance.json/{zipcode1}/{zipcode2}/{units}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "redline-redline-zipcode.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Zip Code to Location Information
api_list.description: Returns location information for a zip code.  This information includes city, state, latitude, longitude, and time zone information.  It also contains a list of other acceptable city names for the location.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://redline-redline-zipcode.p.rapidapi.com/rest/info.json/08057/degrees"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "redline-redline-zipcode.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://redline-redline-zipcode.p.rapidapi.com/rest/info.json/{zipcode}/{units}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "redline-redline-zipcode.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Location to Zip Code
api_list.description: Returns zip codes for a given city.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://redline-redline-zipcode.p.rapidapi.com/rest/city-zips.json/Moorestown/NJ"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "redline-redline-zipcode.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://redline-redline-zipcode.p.rapidapi.com/rest/city-zips.json/{city}/{state}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "redline-redline-zipcode.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
